title: Piauindia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Organic, Fusion, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian restaurant with several vegan choices, including a daily pris fixe for lunch. Excellent atmosphere and a balanced attempt at fusing Northeastern traditions from Piaui with Oriental trends from South India. Try the vegan samosas.
streetAddress: Vpla Acamp Pacheco Fernandes Rua 7 Rua 9, 2
